messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Undoing damage
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/29/2003 4:56:57 PM Eastern Standard Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: Because me was sleeping on two pillows on your
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/29/2003 4:56:57 PM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
"Because me was sleeping on two pillows on your
bed, then me got two pillows from my bed, and now me is sleeping on
four!" (He does that with his pronouns, saying me when he should
say I, saying we when he should us--is that normal for a 4 1/2 year
old?)
Well, you have to cut his brain some slack -- he was busy adding!! :)

Nance

P.S. It sounds normal to me.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
